description: One of the fastest Userbot for managing Your Telegram Account.. Much secured than many other Userbots...

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ROYALBOT_SESSION.description: Please Get this value from Replit session or from our secured Telegram String Bot - @gjkik_bot (recommended)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.
